data.text: Dòun zunu, ni è ɓɔɠɔ ɠɛɛʋɛ ga zeelagai è-wɔɔlai ta maaɠuye vai zu,
ni è ɓɔɠɔ ɠilia ga è-laawooiti,
naa ma, nii ɗa kɛ dòun zunu, ɓɔɠɔ vie,
Mina va bu, ɲiimɛnii ʋa lɔ è-ɠaazu,
Ɓɔɠɔ vie ga dopai ɠɛʋele, é ɠulazu dosoiti zea,
Ɗɛi è ga ɲaka nui, li lɛɛ pupuiti pɔ bɛ, è ti ʋɛtɛ,
Ta-wɛlɛma nu la ná,
ta ɗa ti-ɠɔnɔgi ɓɛtɛ, foɠo undaaɠulazuʋɛ,
Ɲaka nui, ɗa yɛsu laani, eyɛsu yeelɛ?
È lago ɲi nɔ, è lago ɠaazuʋɛɛ ma fɔin nɔ,
naama ziɛgi zu, baladai ɠa na ʋa è ʋɔ eɠɛ siɛziɛ nui,
Nu ɲakai ɠa ga telebotala nui,
é ɗa ɠaazuʋɛ loo ma, é ɗa ɠɔɠɔiti gaaloɠa,
yaava ɠisiɛi nɔ ɠa é ziimaʋɛ,
Naa ɠa é ba, koloɠolo fai ɠa ɠɛ ga kulafilibai,
Faa lɔzita ɠa ná, nii bɛlɛɠulaai Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ,
gaazulɛɛ ɠaazui, zɛɛ wo nɛgi,
nu yii nii é ɠisiɛzu telebotala vaiti su,
zɛɛ zeelei, é zɛɛ zeele wooi wosu,
Dòun zunu, ɠizɛ è-ɠɛɛ ná-deveiti su,
Makɛ ti ma yeenɔpɛ è-yiimaʋɛ,
Ta lo è luɠɔ ɗa-ziɛi zu,
Mazɔlɔɔ devei ɠa ga lanboi,
Ta è makɛ wɛɛnziɛ anzanui ziɛ ʋelei ma,
Mina ɠaazuɠula ná-pagi ʋa è-yiimaʋɛ,
Mazɔlɔɔ koloɠolo anzanui maaʋele ma, ɗa ʋala ɗa-ɓulu ɓuɠai nɔ ma,
Nu ɠa zoo nɛi é abui lɔ ná-zuvai zu,
Nu ɠa zoo nɛi é ziɛ abulekai ɠa,
Zenɔ ɠana é la, ga naama nui nii é ʋilɛsu seiɲɔɠɔi anzai ʋolu,
Nu la unma nui ʋɛlɛʋiliga, nii é unmai wosu ga é kogi zulaave,
Anɛɛ naa ʋe, ni ta sona, maanɛɛʋɛ é potogi ve ga seizu lɔfela,
Kɛlɛ zɔi é wɛɛnziɛgi ɠɛɛzu anzanui ʋɔ, naa ʋalagɛ faaɠaaɠai ma,
Toɠa kpɔlɔi zɔlɔɔ ta ɓaaɠulamai,
Mazɔlɔɔ toloi ɠa ɗa anzazinigi yiiɠula,
É la unmɔɔ gani nɔpɛ soga,
